text:
My children have been to this branch and I am very grateful for the lessons and care from the teachers, principals and all the staffs.
I would give a full 5 stars review, just that, i was quite disappointed when I asked to meet up with my child's teacher to know about her progress in school, as I co-parent. Apparently, the school didn't allow me to do so.
Which was weird, as even full-time Madrasahs would do that, if it is for the betterment of the child's well-being.
My constructive feedback: School has to listen to *both* sides of stories if they co-parent, especially if it is for the child's well-being.
Thank you, all in all, and may Allah bless your effort.
I really would not recommend this center as their cleanness is bad kid often fall sick and HMFD always have
My son enjoyed his time there but teachers tend to be strict.
